sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 画中整体的冷色调连同金黄的草与塔尖，堪称完美。

sentences.english: How still the bells in steeples stand.
The tower is designed to put the antenna at a maximum height on the spire.
sentences.chinese: 电视塔的天线设计在塔尖的最高处。

sentences.english: We looked at the tower the spire of which was golden.
sentences.chinese: 我们望着塔尖是金黄色的那座塔。

sentences.english: Another landed on the church steeple.
sentences.chinese: 另一颗炸弹抛在教堂的塔尖上。

sentences.english: The church spire is visible from miles away, and the parish operates an adjoining school.
sentences.chinese: 教堂塔尖几英里之外就可见到，它有一个附属学校。

sentences.english: There were very few church steeples that survived World War II in western Europe.
sentences.chinese: 在二战期间很少有教堂的塔尖能保留下来。

sentences.english: A black iron cock sits on the spire of the town church.
sentences.chinese: 一只黑色的铁公鸡坐在村里教堂的塔尖上。

sentences.english: The tower is surmounted with a spire.
First, recent claims of the mausoleum's minarets tilting are untrue.
sentences.chinese: 首先，最近有关陵墓塔尖倾斜的说法是不实的。

sentences.english: The spires of churches are to be seen pricking up through the greenery .
sentences.chinese: 透过葱翠的树林可以看见那耸立著的教堂的塔尖。

sentences.english: At the end of the last century, a marvelous spire was added, which makes it soar up slenderly into the German skies.
sentences.chinese: 它又被加上了完美的塔尖，俏丽地矗立在德国的天空。

sentences.english: The pinnacle of the pagoda caught the last of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳的余晖照射到塔尖上。

sentences.english: Contributing to the beautiful composition, meteor streak and church apex both gesture toward the North Celestial Pole.
sentences.chinese: 流星尾迹和教堂塔尖都指向北极星，真是美不胜收。

sentences.english: The view of the top of the Eiffel Tower was obscured by the inclement weather.
sentences.chinese: 艾菲尔铁塔的塔尖已经湮灭在了恶劣的下雪天中。

definition: top floor/the top of a building
tall and erect, reaching through the clouds (idiom); used to describe tall mountain or skyscraper
to overlook/to look down from a height
to look up at/to look up to sb hopefully
